BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_DEFAULT_VALUES.desc: Load bgp device global table with fields set to default values

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_TSA_TEST.desc: Load bgp device global table with tsa_enabled set to true

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_TSB_TEST.desc: Load bgp device global table with tsa_enabled set to false

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_INVALID_VALUE.desc: Load bgp device global table with invalid value

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_WCMP_DEFAULT_VALU.desc: Verify default value for WCMP_ENABLED field in BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL.

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_WCMP_ENABLED.desc: Verify value for WCMP_ENABLED in BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL is set to true.

BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL_WITH_WCMP_DISABLED.desc: Verify value for WCMP_ENABLED in BGP_DEVICE_GLOBAL is set to false.
